item.title: Cauliflower Crust Pizza
item.description: Ingredients 2 cups of finely ground Cauliflower Rice (from one head of Cauliflower) 1/4 cup parmesan cheese 1/4 cup cheddar or mozzarella cheese 1/4 teaspoon salt 1/2 teaspoon basil 1/2 teaspoon oregano 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder 1/8 teaspoon red chili powder 2 tablespoon almond flour 1 egg Method Place a pizza stone in the oven. Preheat oven to 450 degrees. On a cutting board, prepare a piece of parchment paper and spray it with avocado oil.
